transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		canal as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> diffus
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		Canal as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> chantier
source(output(
		Responsable as string,
		DateOffre as string,
		matches as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> responsable
rename, Arrange union(byName: true)~> diffusChantierUnion
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		Responsable = reviewColonne@Responsable,
		Offre,
		{Créateur offre},
		Canal,
		CodeATC = ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Arrange
diffus select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		CodeATC,
		Canal = canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
chantier select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		NbLogement,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		{Créateur offre},
		Canal,
		Source,
		UserLowerCase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> reviewColonne
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		Responsable,
		ATC,
		NomATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endResponsable
reviewColonne, endResponsable join(reviewColonne@Responsable == endResponsable@Responsable,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
responsable derive(UserLowerCase = toString(byName('UserLowerCase'))) ~> MapDrifted1
diffusChantierUnion sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix client} as string,
		{Prix négoce} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Typologie projet} as string,
		DateValidite as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['stg_offre.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> stgOffre
